original_title: Sri Lanka’s Janashakthi Insurance buys 25-pct of First Capital
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s Janashakthi Insurance plc said it had purchased a 25 percent stake in First Capital Holdings Plc from Janashakthi Limited for LKR 3,754,586,743, on Friday (22).

“Janashakthi Insurance PLC has purchased 101,201,799 ordinary shares at a price of LKR 37.10 per share representing a stake of 25% of the issued shares of First Capital Holdings PLC (FCH),” the company said in a statement on the Colombo Stock Exchange.
“This transaction creates strategic synergies for both Janashakthi Insurance PLC and First Capital Holdings PLC.”
Janashakthi Limited is the parent company of Janashakthi Insurance PLC. (Colombo/Dec27/2023)
